arts.sum: Watch highlights from the thrilling Scottish Premiership match between Hibernian and Aberdeen.
Aberdeen manager Jimmy Thelin is delighted with the performances of second-half replacements but rues a late defensive lapse in a topsy-turvy 3-3 draw with Hibs at Easter Road.

arts.ttl: 'Hibs togetherness there for everyone to see'
arts.sum: Head coach David Gray is happy with the spirit shown by his players as Hibs twice come from behind to snatch a dramatic 3-3 draw with Aberdeen.

arts.ttl: Bushiri earns Hibernian point as Aberdeen clash has twist in the tail
arts.sum: Embattled Hibernian finally had something to cheer after Rocky Bushiri's last-gasp equaliser salvaged a 3-3 draw at home to Aberdeen in a topsy-turvy Easter Road showdown featuring three stoppage-time goals.

arts.ttl: Inside the dressing rooms after Hibs stun Aberdeen as Dons left on the floor but Gray LOVES late show for a change
arts.sum: David Gray was delighted his side showed some fight but Thelin says his troops were gutted in the dressing room

arts.ttl: Rocky Bushiri earns Hibernian a point as Aberdeen clash has a twist in the tail
arts.sum: There were three goals in stoppage time.

arts.ttl: Hibs 0 Aberdeen 0 LIVE as the Dons look to get title bid back on track while David Gray suffers
arts.sum: It's a huge night in Leith as both teams desperately need the points for very different reasons

arts.ttl: Aberdeen stars set 20 goal challenge but Jimmy Thelin is happy if they keep spreading the joy
arts.sum: Jimmy Thelin would love it if someone stepped up to the plate and hit 20 goals, but as long as the team keep scoring them then he's a happy man

arts.ttl: How to watch Hibernian vs Aberdeen with PPV option for crunch Scottish Premiership clash
arts.sum: It's a big game at both ends of the table struggling Hibs welcome Aberdeen

arts.ttl: Podcast: Hibs v Aberdeen preview & who is new Rangers CEO?
arts.sum: We look ahead to Hibs V Aberdeen and get the lowdown on new Rangers CEO Patrick Stewart.
